author: Tami S
title: Tami S
text:
The entertainment seating is made with quality materials, and I am very happy with the look and feel of the material. Everything was as expected. I was very impressed with the look and feel of the seats. We special ordered and knew that it was going to take 2-3 months to receive our entertainment seats. The Lighting and extra White Glove and Warranty is worth it for me.
We had two issues with an extension cord and a bracket, but Richard (our rep) was very helpful and is sending out to us immediately.
I am very happy with the purchase and the Customer Service.
Tami
